title: [K-12] Online Workshop for Developing Digital Competencies for Future Science Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-Level Secondary Science Education Knowledge and Mathematics Curriculum Application Skills
context.additional_context: A course strengthening competencies in designing and implementing digital technology-based instruction in a BYOD environment, emphasizing LMS-based self-directed learning and peer collaboration.

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more integrated science-mathematics lesson materials using digital tools (virtual labs, data visualization software, etc.)
Learners can revise and enhance digital lesson designs twice or more through peer evaluation on online collaboration platforms
Learners can engage in five or more reflective discussions on the educational effectiveness of digital technology-integrated teaching methods in LMS discussion forums
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
